definition: loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)

sentences.english: Methods Retrospective re-view of the clinical data of 34 pineal region tumors was reported and our surgical experience presented.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顾34例松果体区肿瘤的临床资料和手术体会。

sentences.english: The Pineal Toning Technique is different for each individual.
sentences.chinese: 松果体音阶技术对每个个体是不同的。

sentences.english: The capillaries were found lined by thick non-fenestrated endothelial cells.
sentences.chinese: 松果体毛细血管衬以厚的无窗孔内皮细胞。

sentences.english: When activated, the pineal gland becomes the line of communication with the higher planes.
sentences.chinese: 当受刺激激活的时候，松果体与更高层面的通讯连线。

sentences.english: When your mind wanders, you bring it back to the pineal gland.
sentences.chinese: 当你们的意识偏离了，就要把它带回到松果体。

sentences.english: The parenchymal lobules were organized with a many pinealocytes and a few glial cells.
sentences.chinese: 实质小叶由大量松果体细胞和少数胶质细胞组成。

sentences.english: Conclusion The surgery for the lesions in the pineal region is feasible via the transoccipito-supratentorial key hole operation approach.
sentences.chinese: 结论经枕幕上锁孔手术入路行松果体区手术是可行的。

sentences.english: Ancient Greeks'believed the pineal gland to be our connection to the Realms of Thought.
sentences.chinese: 古希腊人相信松果体连接我们的思想领域。

sentences.english: Ask your doctor about melatonin supplements.
sentences.chinese: 也可以询问医生是否需要补充松果体素。

sentences.english: The pinal gland produces melatonin through the night and starts when darkness falls.
sentences.chinese: 松果体在晚间制造褪黑激素，并从夜幕低垂时开始。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of pinealctomy and melatonin on the cell cycle distribution during T cell development in thymus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨松果体对胸腺分化发育时细胞周期的影响。

definition: pituitary glands (at the base of the skull)
endocrine gland/gland producing internal secretion, e.g. hormone
